ResourceHeader.Description:
Active Space Potential Control (ASPOC)
ASPOC is to maintain the potential of the spacecraft at a low voltage. The tendency to attain high positive voltage due mainly to photoelectron emission is sought to be neutralized by shooting out positive indium ions. The spacecraft potential is continuously monitored by the PEACE instrument

Instrument.InvestigationName: ASPOC (Active Space Potential Control) on Double Star 1
